data.text: @DevineBarrister Hey Cath, you're most welcome! It's our pleasure. Hope to see you again on board. Cheers! - Norine
@maovato Hi Mauricio, would you mind sending us a DM (direct message) here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya
@Candour100 Hi Candour, I'm sorry to hear your folks' flight got cancelled. We’d love the chance to chat with you about this and see what we can do. Could you please DM us here? Thanks – Norine
@maovato Hi Mauricio, I'm sorry to hear that you're unable to get through the website or by phone. You may send us a DM so we can assist. Thanks - Leslie

data.text: @DevineBarrister Hi Cath, I understand travelling at these times can really be stressful. Would you mind sending us a DM here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Norine

@SpongeWaite I understand the frustration, Mike. To keep our costs as low as possible, we give our customers the choice to add checked baggage if they need it. We’re usually proud of the experience our team helps us deliver for customers and I'm sorry if this was not your experience. - Norine
@Jo_Hall9 Hi, Jo. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks - Dan
@Pillai_Pri Hi, Priyanka. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a DM for assistance. Thanks, -Jay
@dprbyrne Hi David, we'd like to further check this for you. Please send us a direct message here. Thanks - Jaya

@Chrisfallen Hi Chris, I'm sorry to hear about what happened. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. If you need further assistance with your booking, you may send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi

data.text: @4NonRons Hi Ron, if there are any changes that we think may affect our customers, we will update our travel alerts page here - https://t.co/9NQ0MQVJYe. For assistance on your booking, you may send us a DM. Thanks - Jay

data.text: @dprbyrne Hi David, I certainly understand that travelling at these times can really be stressful. There is a range of travel dates included in the flight deals, meaning travel does not need to occur right away. I hope that helps. Thanks - Norine
@SimonBennettNZ Hi Simon. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Ryan
@SpongeWaite Hi Maike, I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience. We'd like to look into this further for you. Please send us a direct message here. Thanks - Jaya

@Lange_20 Hi Simon, I certainly understand this is something stressful for you. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. If you need further assistance, we'd love the chance to look into this further for you. Just please send us a DM. Thanks - Norine
@teriw_teri Hi Teri, we'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message (DM) with your full name and booking reference. Thanks - Leslie
@nicktredrea Hi Nicholas, please send us a DM so we can look into this once more. Thanks - Bree
@lozzmc92 Hi Lauren, flights are usually available 9-12 months in advance. Thanks - Leslie
@_ceephus Would you mind sending us a DM please, @_ceephus - we may be able to provide more details about your delayed flight. Thanks - Ryan
@Senior_Smith Hi Andrew. Mind sending us a DM with your booking details? We'd be happy to look into this for you. Thanks - Jay

@Senior_Smith Hi Andrew, you’ll always be eligible for a credit voucher for the full value of your booking if your Jetstar Airways flight is cancelled or affected by border restriction changes. Terms and Conditions apply. You may send us a DM if you need more assistance. Thanks – Bree

data.text: @Senior_Smith We appreciate your feedback Andrew. If your flight will be affected by any changes due to border restrictions, you will be notified before your flight. You may also check travel alerts here for updates: https://t.co/5OIZ1djcKu. Thanks - Chichi
@AyalTusia Hi @AyalTusia. We know how inconvenient this could be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’ll see what we can do about this. Thanks – Ryan
@hazitgood We understand how important this to you. Would you mind sending us a direct message here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya

@AyalTusia Hi, I understand that you prefer a refund than a voucher. We're offering flexibility to customers with flights to/from VIC to obtain a voucher. If your flight is cancelled, refunds may include depending on the circumstances. For further assistance, please DM us. Thanks - Norine
@AyalTusia Hi @AyalTusia.o Sorry to hear your flight has been affected by the border closure. Please DM us so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks -Ryan

@hazitgood I apologise if you weren’t updated on what was happening with your flight. I know it doesn’t make up for the frustration experienced but once a flight is cancelled, it can be hard for us to predict exactly how long the disruption will last. I appreciate your patience. - Chichi

@NichollsRP I understand how important this flight for you, Rich. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM – Ryan
@NichollsRP Hi Rich, I understand your situation. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

data.text: @NichollsRP Hi Rich, I understand that travelling at these times can really be stressful. We do everything we can to keep our flights on schedule. But we can't guarantee it, which is why we don't promise this in our contract of carriage. Thanks - Norine
@mskarinalouise Hi Karina,  thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@npk0com Thanks for letting us know @npk0com! At the moment there are no reported issues about any payment error - I would recommend clearing your cookies and cache. Thanks - Dan

data.text: @waifujade Hi Jade. I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. If you require assistance with rebooking your flight/s or would like to explore alternative options, please Dm us. Thanks – Ryan
@MartyJWilkins Hi, Marty. Thanks for reaching out. I am sorry for the inconvenience. Would you mind sending us a Direct Message with more details? Thanks, -Jay
@alexday63 I'm sorry to hear about your experience. I would advise to check the app later or alternatively send us a DM if you need immediate assistance with your booking. Thanks - Chichi
@SwapnadeepBhar Wow! What wonderful creativity, Swapnadeep. I'm sure you have put a lot of work into this piece and thanks for sharing your artistic side with us! - Norine
@alexday63 I appreciate how disappointing this has been to you, Alex. You may use our website and find your flights through Manage Booking here: https://t.co/h22A2zVnay. Thanks - Bree

urls.title: COVID-related flight changes and cancellations | Jetstar
urls.description: With travel restrictions changing regularly due to COVID-19, you may need to change your travel plans. Check your options for flexible flying here.

domain.name: Ongoing News Story
domain.description: Ongoing News Stories like 'Brexit'

domain.description: A taxonomy of user interests.

data.text: @jordo83 Hi J, I'm sorry to hear if you are unhappy with the voucher due to your flight being affected by border restriction changes. I hope this link will help you know more about Jetstar COVID-19 changes and cancellations:  https://t.co/IB4jkhl2io. Thanks - Bree

@StephenHeath85 Hey @StephenHeath85. There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Our priority is to make your flight comfortable and fun.  Thank you for choosing Jetstar! - Ryan

@alexday63 Hi Alby, I'm sorry to hear you have difficulties trying to sign in on your Jetstar app. Kindly uninstall it and re-install it again. If the same error still occurs, you can use our website alternatively to check your flights. Thanks - Norine

@ErizeJay Hi Comandante, we do appreciate your feedback for getting Toowoomba to be available. We’ve keep to review our network on a regular basis. You can check our website anytime for any updates. - Thanks, Ralph.

@Dicentraspect I recognise your disappointment, @Dicentraspect. Our website works on a ‘first to pay’ basis so if more than one person is trying to book the last few fares at a certain price at the same time, the person who makes their payment first gets that price.  Thanks - Ryan
@Dicentraspect That’s definitely not the experience we’d want for customers like yourself, @Dicentraspect. Thanks for letting us know so we can look into what happened here. Thanks - Ryan
@sammiedude88 Hello Sam. I’m sorry to hear that you may have made a mistake when making your booking on our website. Please send us DM for further assistance. Thanks - Ryan

@EwelinaRatajcz2 Hi Ewelina, I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@yugoquokka Hi Vlad, sorry to hear your flight has been cancelled. Please send us a DM so we can look into your options and assist. Thanks - Leslie
@Vossy7 Hi Chris! can you send us a DM of the screenshot of the error and also your booking reference number and your complete name so that we could check, please? -Lee

@camillacc Hi there, I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. We'd like to look into this further for you. Could you please send us a direct message? Thanks - Jaya
@trainwreckrick Hey there, can you send us a DM of your booking reference number and your complete name, please? -Lee
@TLBMama Hi there, we’re usually very proud of the customer service our team delivers, so we’d like to look into this further. If you could send us a direct message, we can get that started. – Jaya

data.text: @taniadebono_ Hi Tania, we limit carry on to 7kgs in total for each passenger – including things like handbags and laptop bags. If you think you might need a little more, you can purchase an extra 7kgs online before you fly. Thanks – Jay

@crispi_1971 Hi Chris,  I'm sorry to hear about your disrupted flights. We do our best to avoid delays – but sometimes things are out of our hands. Would you mind sending us a direct message - we may be able to provide more details about your flight. Thanks - Jaya
@d3n0tz Hi there, can you send us the link through DM so I can take a closer look on this? Thanks - Bree

data.text: @thatbro83 @FlyAirNZ @thatbro83 Hi. You may refer on flights availability on our website: https://t.co/lgtoKzE9Ps - Do keep an eye on our travel alerts page here: https://t.co/pVICCF9jYP for any updates. - Jay

data.text: @esstee7 Hi EssTee, I appreciate your frustration. If there will be any update or changes on these restrictions, we'll post it on our travel alerts: https://t.co/ZqoUS87Bxz - If you require booking assistance, feel free to send us a DM. - Leslie

@esstee7 Hi EssTee, we’re here to help! You’ll always be eligible for a credit voucher for the full value of your booking if your Jetstar Airways flight is cancelled or affected by border restriction changes. Ts and Cs apply. This link may help: https://t.co/dnLCNJswEK. Thanks – Bree
@orolyat Hi Taylor, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@new_horizon Hi thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@Ana_Kavanagh Hi, Ana. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message with your booking reference and name for further assistance. Thanks, -Jay

@new_horizon Hi there, I appreciate that paying extra can be frustrating. Carry-on and checked baggage are weighed separately – so if your carry-on is over the weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee. -  Leslie
@Christie_farrow Hi Christie, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@thatbro83 Hello @thatbro83. I know that this is important for you. Please send us DM for more updates. Thank you! - Ryan
@OfficialEoin Hi, would you mind sending us a direct message here? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks - Jaya

@AlekiToleafoa Hi Aleki. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with more info? We’ll see what we can do. – Ryan
@claireharrisoz Hi, Claire. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, - Dan

@smolpayne Hi Kahlia, I'm sorry to hear that. We’re offering passengers who are due to fly in/out of MEL on or before 14 June the option to either cancel their booking and receive a credit voucher, or a free move until 24 June. If you require assistance, please send us a DM. - Leslie

@AlekiToleafoa Hi Aleki, thanks for reaching out! Could you send us a DM so we can look into this for you? Also, for your privacy, we advise to remove your booking details on a public forum. Thanks - Leslie
@JUANOMORA Hi, Juan. That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. Would you mind sending us a Direct Message so we can look into it further? Thanks, -Jay
@emmaleesharp Hi Emma, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@NessyKay1 Hi NessyKay, I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We’d like to check this out for you, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@Daemin Hi Dominik, I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We’d like to sort this out for you, please contact us directly via DM with your full name. Thanks - Chichi

@earthtorosita Hi Rosita,  I'm sorry to hear about your experience. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@rez125 Hi there. I’m very sorry to hear about your disrupted flight. We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Please send us a direct message. Thanks - Jaya

@DrBazh Hi @DrBazh, while delays are hard to plan for, you can be certain that our team are working hard to get you up in the air ASAP. Please send us a Direct Message (DM) if you need further assistance. Thanks, Ralph
@benhiggins83 Hi Ben, sorry to hear about your recent experience. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message so we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya

@ChopperPhil Hi Pheel, I'm sorry to hear your flight got cancelled and you did not receive any notification about it. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Norine
@HeathMorley Hi Heath, You are welcome! Please keep safe. - Norine

@jb_saunders Hi Jamie, I know that you're unhappy with the charges in changing your flights. We'd like to look into this for you, please send us a DM so we can assist you on your booking. Thanks - Bree

@jb_saunders Hi Jamie, fare rules would apply in changing flights, but I appreciate your patience to wait for more updates as we are continually reviewing our networks, and you'll get notified directly for any changes. Thanks - Bree

@jordo83 Hi Jordo, I understand where the frustration is coming from. That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can assist you further with your booking? Thanks - Norine
@jb_saunders Hi Jamie, if the flight will be impacted as a result, options will be provided for you. You can send us a DM (direct message) if you need further assistance on your booking. Thanks – Dan

@jb_saunders Hi Jamie, we’re offering passengers who are due to fly in or out of Melbourne on or before 10 June the option to cancel their booking and receive a credit voucher, or to move their flight free of charge (until 24 June). You may DM us if you need further assistance. Thanks – Jay
@godemons27 Hi there, the voucher process is up to 14 business days from the date of request. Thanks - Leslie

@Celtic334 Hi Ryan, I'm sorry to hear about your experience over the phone. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@Rossco2810 Hi Rossco, I understand how upsetting it can be when travel plans change. We do our best to avoid making changes to our schedules unless it’s absolutely necessary. Feel free to send us a DM if you need further assistance with your booking. Thanks - Norine
@mrwizard68 Hi Francis, that's really good to hear! You're welcome and we hope to see you on board! Thanks - Norine

@Guesty22 Hi Matt, we know how inconvenient changed flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. Would you mind sending us a DM with your booking reference and full name? We’ll see what we can do to get you on your way to your destination. – Bree
@Noemie34228241 Hi, Noemie. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, -Jay
@samccosgrove Hi Sam, would you mind sending us a DM, so we could look into your booking? Thanks - Bree
@schmikmik Hi Michael, I'm sorry to hear that. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks – Leslie

@Dordles_1 Thanks for your tweet Brad. We appreciate you're feedback at the website and we are working on the updates. If you need assistance with a current booking, you may send us a DM to help you out. Thanks - Chichi
@jemo8009 Hi Joel, we'd like to look into this for you. Can you send us a DM with your booking reference and full name? Thanks - Bree
@mnkearney Hi Mark, we'd like to look into your booking to check for any options. Can you send us a DM with your booking reference and full name? Thanks - Bree
@marcellekirby5 Hi Marcelle, I'm sorry to hear that. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks – Leslie

@CatherineDobbie That doesn’t sound like the sort of experience we want any of our customers to have, @CatherineDobbie. Would you mind sending us a DM so we can look into it further? Thank you. - Ryan
@bulldogzrep Hi Hamza no worries. We’d like to help you with the insurance, please contact us directly via DM to assist you further. Thanks - Chichi

@leen26748864 Hi leen, I'm sorry to hear you haven't received any reply. All queries and complaints are assisted here in this platform, via our FB Live Messenger, Live Chat on our website and via our TelRes Team at 131 538. Please send us a DM if you need further assistance. Thanks - Norine

@BarkyMalarkey1 Hi, I appreciate that you're having a hard time finding your preferred flights. You may try checking other dates from Gold Coast to Darwin on our website: https://t.co/vk2C5XJw2H. Thanks - Bree
@bulldogzrep Yes that is right, you may book directly at the website. If you need further assistance, please send us a DM. Thanks - Chichi
